name: Star Swirl
description:
Star Swirl - A beautiful glitter topper that consists of fine dark blue holo glitter, large purple holo dots, silver holo stars and silver holo hex glitters.

Apply 1/2 layers with a dabbing motion letting each one dry in between. Use with topcoat for a super smooth finish. (Polishes with snowflakes/stars may need two coats of topcoat.) Some fishing may be required for the dots/stars.

Shipping within the UK only.
DUE TO ROYAL MAIL RESTRICTIONS PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE 4 POLISHES AT A TIME. YOU MAY PURCHASE MORE THAN 4 IF YOU ADD THE EXTRA POSTAGE LISTING TO YOUR CART. THANK YOU :)

All the nitty gritty stuff:

FORMULATION is 5-FREE:

DPB FREE
Formaldehyde FREE
Formaldehyde Resin FREE
Toluene FREE
Camphor FREE

INGREDIENTS: Ethyl Acetate, Butyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Denatured Alcohol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimelitic, Anhydride Copolymer, Triphenyl Phosphate, Trimethyl Pentanyl, Disobutyrate, Acrylates Copolymer, Silica, CI60725, Solvent Resistant Glitters.

If kept at a cold (such as on an outside wall in a polish rack) temperature polish may become slow moving, it will restore back to its normal state when at room temperature.
Use within 24 months.
None of my products have been tested on animals.

name: Shining Armor MY LITTLE PONY - Winter Collection 2013
description:
Shining Armor - a gorgeous winter glitter topper with light blue, dark blue and red fine glitter and white snowflakes. Some fishing is required for the snowflakes as they are heavier than the other glitters.

You will receive a 10ml bottle with 1 mixing ball.

Apply 2/3 layers letting each one dry in between. Use with topcoat for a super smooth finish. (Polishes with snowflakes/stars may need two coats of topcoat.)

Shipping within the UK only.

name: Limited Edition - Marshmallow Magic
description:
Only 3 available!!!

Marshmallow magic is our first glow in the dark polish!
You can use a normal light to charge it (i use the flash on my phone in torch mode) 
Apply 2/3 layers letting each one dry in between. Use with topcoat for a super smooth finish.
This is a 10ml bottle with 2 mixing balls.

Shipping within the UK only.
DUE TO ROYAL MAIL RESTRICTIONS PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE 4 POLISHES AT A TIME. YOU MAY PURCHASE MORE THAN 4 IF YOU ADD THE EXTRA POSTAGE LISTING TO YOUR CART. THANK YOU :)

name: Roxie Chick
description:
5 free, handmade nail polish.

Roxie Chick - like Rock Chick, but Roxie instead. Named after one of my gorgeous Chocolate Labradors - is a pink shimmery jelly polish with gold squares, blue hex and silver holo dots. 

Apply one coat, let it dry, apply another coat, keep doing so until it is opaque enough for your liking. (Swatch is: Fore finger - 2 coats, middle is 3, ring is 2 and pinkie is 2!)

Use with topcoat for a super smooth finish.
This is 10ml bottle with 1 mixing ball.

Shipping is within the UK only.
DUE TO ROYAL MAIL RESTRICTIONS PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE 4 POLISHES AT A TIME. YOU MAY PURCHASE MORE THAN 4 IF YOU ADD THE EXTRA POSTAGE LISTING TO YOUR CART. THANK YOU :)

n butyl acetate
nitrocellulose
Acrylates Copolymer 
Along with the following pigments: FD&C lakes, D&C lakes, iron oxides, iron blue, titanium dioxide

name: Extra postage for over 4 polishes.
description:
Please add this to your basket as many times as you need to if you purchase more than 4 polishes!

Due to Royal Mail restrictions i will need to ship two separate packages one consisting of 4 polishes and then another with the remaining polishes

If you order 10 polishes, for example (wishful thinking hahaha) you'd need to pay 3 times the postage because 3 parcels would have to be sent out

4 = 1 package
8 = 2 packages
12 = 3 packages
and so on!
